overview: Behind the closed door of Room #69, secrets are made and kept. Straight men with gay fantasies are the city's dirty little secret. Well, at least they were a secret... Straight men have strayed along the sexual path. Curiosity has drawn them to the sexually deviant behavior that takes place behind the door of this apartment. Witness real sexual encounters with the most attractive, well-built, and muscular men... Some very well-endowed men to engage yourself with along the way.
title: Apartment #69
